title: Why is leaving the game even an option?
body: Just remove the damn thing entirely.

replies.body: Because relogging to fix issues is a necessity.
Because there are people that have actual reasons to need to leave the game.
Because people would simply turn off their computers if that option wasn't there.
Not giving an option to leave would make the game closer to malware.
Because sometimes there's a feeder and you just don't wanna sit through that.
